text: The Minister of Public Security was a member of the Executive Committee of the Privy Council of Northern Ireland (Cabinet) in the Parliament of Northern Ireland from 1940 to 1944. {| class="wikitable" |- ! # ! Name ! Took Office ! Prime Minister !colspan=2|Party |- | 1. | John MacDermott | 25 June 1940 | Craigavon, Andrews |- | 2. | William Grant | 10 November 1941 | Andrews |- | 3. | Harry Midgley | 6 May 1943 | Brooke |- |} ==Parliamentary Secretary to the Ministry of Public Security== *1941 – 1943 Brian Maginess Office abolished 1943 ==References== *The Government of Northern Ireland Category:1940 establishments in Northern Ireland Category:1944 disestablishments in Northern Ireland Category:Executive Committee of the Privy Council of Northern Ireland
title: Minister of Public Security (Northern Ireland)
